## Dandelion CLI

```
Usage: dlion start <nodes>
       dlion stop <nodes>
       dlion restart <nodes>
       dlion burn [-i|--ignore] <nodes> <binname>
       dlion erase <nodes>
       dlion show
       dlion [-h|--help]

Options:
    -i --ignore     Ignore burning process info.
    -h --help       Show this screen.
```
